# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : credit_approval_detail.py
@Author      : wst
@Time        : 2022/3/14 上午6:35
@Description : 各种审批详情页的序列化器
"""
import datetime

from django.db.models.aggregates import Sum
from django.utils.functional import cached_property
from rest_framework import serializers

from client.apis.v1.base_node import OPEN_APPLICATION, TRANSFER_EXAMINE
from client.models.credit_certificate import (
    CreditCertificate,
    CreditCertificateEnclosure,
    ReviewLog
)
from client.serializers.credit_open import CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer
from consts.common import FEN_TO_YUAN
from utils.drf.fields import FenToYuanFloatField



[文档]class BaseContractDetailSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """ 基础合同详情 """
    contract_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="合同金额")


[文档]    def get_contract_amount(self, val):
        return round(val.contract_amount/100, 2)



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificateEnclosure
        fields = [
            "contract_no", "contract_amount", "contract_sign_at", "contract_enclosure", "invoice_enclosure",
            "other_enclosure"

[文档]class BaseCCApprovalDetailSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """ 基础X信详情--开立用 """
    from_company = serializers.CharField(label="开立企业全称", source="from_company.name")
    from_credit_code = serializers.CharField(label="开立企业社会信用代码", source="from_company.credit_code")
    to_company = serializers.CharField(label="接收企业全称", source="company.name")
    to_credit_code = serializers.CharField(label="接收企业社会信用代码", source="company.credit_code")
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(label="资金机构名称", source="credit.capital_company.name")
    capital_credit_code = serializers.CharField(label="资金机构社会信用代码", source="credit.capital_company.credit_code")
    amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="开立金额")
    acc_contract_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label='累计合同金额')
    financing_annualized_interest_rate = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="融资年化利率")
    apply_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="开立申请日期")
    promise_pay_at = serializers.CharField(label="承诺付款日")
    credit_certificate_receive_time = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="确认接收时限")
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(label="授信编号", source='number')
    start = serializers.DateField(label="授信开始时间", source="credit.start")
    end = serializers.CharField(label="授信结束时间", source="credit.end")
    enclosure = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="附件列表")


[文档]    def get_amount(self, val):
        return round(val.amount/100, 2)



[文档]    def get_acc_contract_amount(self, val):
        contracts = CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.filter(
            credit_certificate_id=val.id)
        if not contracts.exists():
            return 0.00
        agg = contracts.aggregate(total=Sum('contract_amount'))

        return round(agg['total']/100, 2)



[文档]    def get_financing_annualized_interest_rate(self, val):
        return str(val.credit.financing_annualized_interest_rate)



[文档]    def get_apply_at(self, val):
        obj = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=val.id,
            data_table=CreditCertificate._meta.db_table,
            work_flow__code=OPEN_APPLICATION,
            result='pass'
        ).order_by("-id")
        if not obj.exists():
            return ""
        return obj.first().created_at.date()



[文档]    def get_credit_certificate_receive_time(self, val):
        objs = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=val.id,
            data_table=CreditCertificate._meta.db_table,
            work_flow__code=OPEN_APPLICATION
        ).order_by("-id")
        if not objs.exists():
            return ""
        obj = objs.first()
        dt = obj.created_at + datetime.timedelta(hours=val.credit_certificate_receive_time_limit.value)
        return dt.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")



[文档]    def get_enclosure(self, val):
        contracts = CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.filter(credit_certificate_id=val.id)
        return BaseContractDetailSerializer(contracts, many=True).data



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "id", "from_company", "from_credit_code", "to_company", "to_credit_code", "capital_company",
            "capital_credit_code", "amount", "acc_contract_amount", "financing_annualized_interest_rate",
            "apply_at", "promise_pay_at", "credit_certificate_receive_time", "credit_number", "start", "end",
            "enclosure"
        ]




[文档]class ReceiveCCApprovalDetailSerializer(BaseCCApprovalDetailSerializer):
    """ 基础X信详情--转让业务用（包括所有节点） """
    number = serializers.CharField(label="授信编号")
    from_company = serializers.CharField(label="原始开立企业全称", source="credit.receive_company.name")
    transfer_company = serializers.CharField(label="转让企业", source="from_company.name")
    financing_annualized_interest_rate = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="融资年化利率")
    amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="开立金额")
    promise_pay_at = serializers.CharField(label="承诺付款日")
    credit_certificate_receive_time = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="确认接收时限")


[文档]    def get_credit_certificate_receive_time(self, val):
        # 获取X信当前所在节点
        objs = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=val.id,
            data_table=CreditCertificate._meta.db_table,
            work_flow__code=TRANSFER_EXAMINE,
            result='pass'
        ).order_by("-id")
        if not objs.exists():
            return ""
        obj = objs.first()
        dt = obj.created_at + datetime.timedelta(hours=val.credit_certificate_receive_time_limit.value)
        return dt.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "id", "number", "from_company", "transfer_company", "to_company", "capital_company",
            "financing_annualized_interest_rate", "amount", "promise_pay_at", "credit_certificate_receive_time",
            "acc_contract_amount", "enclosure"
        ]

        """获取审批详情"""
        return CapitalFinanceApprovalDetailNestedSerializer(instance).data



[文档]    def get_work_flow(self, instance):
        """获取工作流列表"""
        return instance.get_work_flow()



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('object', 'work_flow')




[文档]class CapitalFinanceApprovalDetailNestedSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """内嵌序列化器: 资金机构融资审批详情"""
    credit_company = serializers.CharField(source='credit.receive_company.name')
    balance = FenToYuanFloatField()
    net_balance = FenToYuanFloatField(source='net_amount')
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source='credit.capital_company.name')
    finance_company = serializers.CharField(source='from_company.name')
    finance_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source='from_company.credit_code')
    financing_annualized_interest_rate = serializers.DecimalField(source='financeproject.financing_annualized_interest_rate', max_digits=5, decimal_places=2)
    financing_annualized_interest = FenToYuanFloatField(source='financeproject.financing_annualized_interest')
    technical_service_rate = serializers.DecimalField(source='financeproject.technical_service_rate', max_digits=5, decimal_places=2)
    technical_service = FenToYuanFloatField(source='financeproject.technical_service')
    information_consultation_rate = serializers.DecimalField(source='financeproject.information_consultation_rate', max_digits=5, decimal_places=2)
    information_consultation = FenToYuanFloatField(source='financeproject.information_consultation')
    financing_net_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    type = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    credit_certificate_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    enclosures = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    total_contract_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    class Meta:
        """元数据"""
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = (
            'id', 'credit_company', 'number', 'promise_pay_at',
            'balance', 'net_balance', 'amount', 'financing_annualized_interest', 'financing_annualized_interest_rate',
            'capital_company', 'finance_company', 'finance_company_credit_code',
            'technical_service_rate', 'technical_service', 'information_consultation_rate', 'information_consultation',
            'financing_net_amount', 'type', 'credit_certificate_amount', 'enclosures', 'total_contract_amount',
        )



[文档]    def to_representation(self, instance):
        self._obj: CreditCertificate = instance
        for attr in ('cached_enclosures', 'cached_parent',):
            if hasattr(self, attr):
                delattr(self, attr)
        return super().to_representation(instance)


    @cached_property
    def cached_parent(self) -> CreditCertificate:
        """缓存父级"""
        return CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
            number=self._obj.path[-1]
        ).select_related(
            'business'
        ).only(
            'amount',
            'business__name'
        ).first()

    @cached_property
    def cached_enclosures(self):
        """缓存附件"""
        return CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.filter(
            credit_certificate_id=self.cached_parent.pk
        ).only(
            'contract_no', 'contract_amount', 'contract_enclosure',
            'contract_sign_at', 'invoice_enclosure', 'other_enclosure'
        )


[文档]    def get_financing_net_amount(self, instance):
        """获取预计融资净额"""
        interests = map(
            lambda x: getattr(instance.financeproject, x),
            ('financing_annualized_interest', 'technical_service', 'information_consultation',)
        )
        net_amount = instance.amount - sum(interests)
        return '%.2f' % (net_amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)



[文档]    def get_type(self, instance):
        """获取信用凭证类型"""
        return self.cached_parent.business.name



[文档]    def get_credit_certificate_amount(self, instance):
        """获取(转让/开立)金额"""
        return '%.2f' % (self.cached_parent.amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)



[文档]    def get_enclosures(self, instance):
        """获取附件"""
        return CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(self.cached_enclosures, many=True).data



[文档]    def get_total_contract_amount(self, instance):
        """获取累计合同金额"""
        total_amount = 0
        if self.cached_enclosures:
            total_amount = sum(map(lambda x: x.contract_amount, self.cached_enclosures))
        return "%.2f" % (total_amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)
